title: Goblet, ca. 1810–25
provenance: Tower Hous Antiques, (angus MacDonald), Bangor, Northern Ireland
description: Small, inverted pear-shaped bowl with flat bottom, short stem with flattened globular knop and broad, circular foot. Wheel engraved on upper part of bowl with alternating sprays and stars in groups of 4. Below, one ring and row of small hatch marks encircle bowl.

tombstone.epitaph:
Goblet, ca. 1810–25.
ca. 1810–25. glass. Bequest of Walter Phelps Warren. 1986-61-210.
